item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 12, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A gracious end to Webb-site (96 points | 10 comments)
2. Git clone –depth 2 is vastly better than –depth 1 if you want to Git push later (45 points | 3 comments)
3. The year I didn't survive (468 points | 114 comments)
4. US and UK refuse to sign AI safety declaration at summit (10 points | 16 comments)
5. I tasted Honda's spicy rodent-repelling tape and I will do it again (2021) (1309 points | 383 comments)
6. Show HN: App that simulates a software engineer's daily job (32 points | 17 comments)
7. JJ Cheat Sheet (155 points | 69 comments)
8. The subtle art of designing physical controls for cars (275 points | 149 comments)
9. No Longer Posting to Pinboard (40 points | 33 comments)
10. Durable plastic gets a sustainability makeover in novel polymerization process (35 points | 8 comments)
11. Backblaze Drive Stats for 2024 (464 points | 144 comments)
12. A quick review of file watchers (12 points | 1 comment)
13. Storytelling lessons I learned from Steve Jobs (2022) (68 points | 32 comments)
14. Launch HN: A0.dev (YC W25) – React Native App Generator (199 points | 69 comments)
15. I wrote a static web page and accidentally started a community (2023) (32 points | 13 comments)
16. Migrate purchases from one Apple Account to another (89 points | 36 comments)
17. ElevenReader by ElevenLabs (112 points | 79 comments)
18. Smoke in the cabin of two 737 MAX caused by Load Reduction Device system [video] (211 points | 52 comments)
19. A Year of Telepathy (86 points | 120 comments)
20. WASM will replace containers (258 points | 244 comments)
21. jj: a Git-compatible VCS that is both simple and powerful (139 points | 88 comments)
22. Postmortem: The singular design of Namco's Katamari Damacy (2004) (122 points | 22 comments)
23. Sky skimmers: The race to fly satellites at the lowest orbits yet (79 points | 40 comments)
24. Ohm: A user-friendly parsing toolkit for JavaScript and TypeScript (79 points | 23 comments)
25. Down the rabbit hole: Implementing SSH port forwarding over AWS Session Manager (23 points | 1 comment)
26. E Ink's color ePaper tech gets supersized for outdoor displays (119 points | 80 comments)
27. Ancient-DNA study identifies originators of Indo-European language family (184 points | 145 comments)
28. Scientists invent "slime" – could be used in medical, energy, robot applications (24 points | 20 comments)
29. Thomson Reuters wins first major AI copyright case in the US (309 points | 138 comments)
30. Intel's Battlemage Architecture (186 points | 120 comments)
